id.description: Unique identifier of the text message.

user_id.description: Phone number of a user who sent/received a text message.

user_phone_number.description: Phone number of a user who sent/received a text message.

incoming.description: Indicator of whether the text message was incoming or not.

resource_phone_number.description: Phone number of a resource the text message was sent to/received by.

resource_type.description: Name of the resource type the text message is attached to.  Possible values:  lead  contact  none

resource_id.description: Unique identifier of the resource the text message is attached to.

associated_deal_ids.description: An array of ids of deals associated to the text message.

sent_at.description: Date and time of the message send time in UTC (ISO8601 format).

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update in UTC (ISO8601 format).

created_at.description: Date and time of creation in UTC (ISO8601 format).
